en.line:
Amane with her face red and mumbling gradually
lowered her head more and more until I noticed
she looked like she was about she was about to
cry.

jp.line: 真っ赤だった先輩は、もごもごと何か言いながら、だんだんと俯いて、気が付くと泣きそうな顔になっていた。
